rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall features a grand Art Deco inspired archway with luxurious finish, ensuring Vastu principles of energy flow from the entrance.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with geometric patterns and elegant Art Deco detailing, featuring a central seating area, art pieces, and integrated lighting. Balancing the Vastu elements of air and light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining space with Art Deco motifs and polished finishes, ensuring a balance between aesthetics and functionality.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed in an open layout. Vastu principles ensure the placement of water elements (sink) away from stove area for safety.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony. Art Deco detailing complements the luxury segment, ensuring a serene space in line with Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Stylish guest bedroom featuring Art Deco interiors and a spacious balcony for relaxation, designed with Vastu principles in mind.

rooms.name: Child's Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy child's bedroom with playful Art Deco accents and a balcony ensuring ample light, adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A modern home theater with state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment, integrated seating, and sound insulation. Designed to be a private entertainment hub within the penthouse.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Compact yet functional living area for servants, including a small kitchenette and essential amenities. Positioned per Vastu guidelines to maintain energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Dedicated space for laundry and storage, designed with streamlined Art Deco finishes.
